summary: Super Bowl LX is TODAY ‚Äî Patriots vs. Seahawks in San Francisco. Crypto.com CEO pivots to AI agents with a Super Bowl commercial launch. BTC stabilizing around $70K after a brutal week. Prediction markets exploding ahead of the big game.

items.headline: Super Bowl LX Today: Patriots vs. Seahawks
items.snippet: New England faces Seattle in San Francisco for Super Bowl 60. Kickoff this evening at Levi's Stadium.

items.headline: Crypto.com Launches OG Prediction Market for Super Bowl
items.snippet: Standalone prediction platform spun off with $17B monthly volume. Super Bowl bets driving massive interest.

items.headline: Crypto.com CEO Pivots to AI Agents with Super Bowl Ad
items.snippet: Kris Marszalek launches ai.com consumer AI agent platform today with a Super Bowl commercial. Major crypto√óAI crossover moment.

items.headline: BTC Rebounds Above $70K After Near-$60K Crash
items.snippet: Bitcoin stabilizing after brutal week. Bitwise CIO says this is not a bull market correction ‚Äî warning of 'crypto winter.'

items.headline: Opinion Raises $20M as Prediction Markets Draw Capital
items.snippet: Blockchain prediction platform raises pre-Series A round despite weak crypto market. Sector remains hot.

items.headline: Wall Street Ends Volatile Week Mixed
items.snippet: Nasdaq fell 1.4% this week as tech stocks weighed. Alphabet's $185B AI capex plans continue to spook investors.
